backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing styling, components, hooks, and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base setup defining color tokens, theme variables, and dark-mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering ValentineLanding with global styles.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Celebr: Canvas-based celebratory overlay with intensity scaling and reduced-motion fallback.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Inevit: Interactive "No" button with dynamic labels and evasive behaviors after several attempts.
frontend/src/components/valentine/noButt: Defines escalating behavior functions that determine how the No button visually reacts or evades user interaction.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Respon: Provides responsive bounds and a container ref to children for positioning logic.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useCel: Hook controlling celebration animation timing and reduced-motion behavior based on intensity.
frontend/src/components/valentine/usePre: Hook detecting system-level reduced-motion preference with live updates.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useSaf: Generates safe, non-overlapping random positions for the No button with optional edge, corner, and repulsion behaviors.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Main Valentine landing component managing app state, animations, and dynamic teasing messages for the Yes/No interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status states.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with Valentine-themed colors, gradients, and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and loading the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current requirements and behavior for a Valentine-themed interactive site with Yes/No flow, images, and feature specifications.
